member.name: M:RoadsApp2.MainPage.TapGestureRecognizerRectangle_Tapped(System.Object,Microsoft.Maui.Controls.TappedEventArgs)
member.summary: This event is only used to toggle flags around a crossroad. Doesn't trigger drawing.

member.name: M:RoadsApp2.MainPage.AddFlagsAroundRectangle(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.Rectangle,RoadsApp2.Utils.Enums.Orientation,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This events adds new flags around a crossroads with except orientation which will be avoided
